Epilogue MC still happy with FMC huh?

One of the better type of ending for these kind of story. The other guy did trained her until she asks him to cum inside. But she also matured on her own, accepting her sexual desire and charm. From there, she starts to curiously explore more ways to get pleasure (actually starts experimenting playing with her back door on her own before that guy asks her for it). She even makes her own choice when having relationship with more men, especially after she graduated high school. Her boyfriend accept it. That other guy also don't stop her or treat her like she's his own property, they draw the line at being sex friends. | Don't like trophy wife ending, so I prefer this kind where the girl is free to do what she wants, or where the ntr guy actually took responsibility and love her back.

So in the end, BF conveniently has the sacred "Voyeur boner from seeing his GF being fuck by other guys" and is only through this that he gets his most intense erection. But unlike most other NTRs where he usually has to fap alone or in a degrading manor, the FMC goes out of her way to burn said BF's voyeur boner with her own body in the form of sex. Well i guess in terms of this hentai keeping to the standard NTR/cuckold formula this story established, this is probably the best outcome for the BF to have. So I guess I'm cool with this final ending in a way.
